title: wtf i have afk penalty
body: i have to wait 20 minutes for 5 games because i was apparently afk??? my last game my computer shhut off along with my internet and it took like 3-4 minutes to get it back online and my team wans't worried that i was gone for long? i dont want to have to wait 20 minutes before each game how can i appeal this ? my account was just recently hacked and banned and i havent been able to receive anything either can someone help

replies.body: Leaverbusters can't be appealed since the afk's were detected. Regardless of why it happened, the other players were still affected by you leaving which is the main reason they're applied. You'll have to wait those games out until the games are played off.
yeah but this was literally like my first case of being afk this year and being time banned i just feel like 20 minutes is so long to have to wait
